name: Ascension: Gun Legends
description:
Ascension: Gun Legends is a 2d action platformer for PC. Your job is simple: pick a game mode and avatar, and WIN!

Step into the world of Ascension. There's a civil war in progress, between the totalitarian Union and the revolutionary Rebellion. And they're really going at it!

Fighters from both sides battle to the death day and night. The sounds of gunfire never cease (because respawning is a thing heh).

Three single player game modes, three dual player game modes.

12 playable characters.

Will you pick a side?

Or fight for both?

Or fight against both?

The game is now available for download! ;)

Modes
  • Duel
  • Royale Solo
  • Royale VS
  • Renegade
  • Capture The Flag
  • Challenge - Phantom Assault
  • Challenge - Fragile World
  • Challenge - Hostile Territory
  • Challenge - Timed Survival
  • Challenge - Null Ammunition
  • Challenge - Null Explosives
Controls

Keyboard and Mouse (Single Player Only)

  • A/D/LEFT/RIGHT: Move
  • W/UP: Jump
  • Move Mouse: Aim
  • Right Click: Fire Bullet
  • Left Click: Fire explosive
  • Space + F: Activate ULTIMATE skill
  • Space + G: Activate MIDDLE skill
  • Space + H: Activate BASIC skill

PS Controller (Single and Dual Player)

  • Left Thumb/Analog Stick - Left/Right: Move
  • Left Thumb/Analog Stick - Up: Jump
  • L1: Alt Jump
  • Right Thumb/Analog Stick: Aim
  • R2: Fire Bullet
  • R1: Fire explosive
  • L2 + BOX: Activate ULTIMATE skill
  • L2 + X: Activate MIDDLE skill
  • L2 + O: Activate BASIC skill
